subject: Re: Open-source projects using JUnit 4
msgSnippet: I hosted an open-source project named gienah-testing to test Spring code (www.springframework.org) using JUnit4. The project is hosted on:
messageBody:
I hosted an open-source project named gienah-testing to test Spring
code (www.springframework.org) using JUnit4. The project is hosted on:

http://code.google.com/p/gienah-testing/

I widely used JUnit4 features like custom Runners and existing
annotations.

Regards.



--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "David Saff" <saff@...> wrote:
>
> All,
>
> Just a quick survey--anyone out there running an open-source project
> making significant use of JUnit 4 features? Custom runners? Thanks,
>
> David Saff
>
